SETS.query: Set of suppliers (A, B, C) and orders (O1, O2,..., ON)

VARIABLES.name: x_O
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable: 1 if order O is placed, 0 otherwise

PARAMETERS.name: cost_A
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier A

PARAMETERS.name: cost_B
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier B

PARAMETERS.name: cost_C
PARAMETERS.description: Cost of ordering each dining table from Supplier C

PARAMETERS.name: tables_A
PARAMETERS.description: Number of tables included in each order from Supplier A

PARAMETERS.name: tables_B
PARAMETERS.description: Number of tables included in each order from Suppliers B and C

PARAMETERS.name: min_tables
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum number of tables to be ordered

PARAMETERS.name: max_tables
PARAMETERS.description: Maximum number of tables to be ordered

PARAMETERS.name: min_orders_A
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum number of orders from Supplier A

PARAMETERS.name: min_orders_B
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum number of orders from Supplier B

PARAMETERS.name: sum_A_B
PARAMETERS.description: Sum of tables supplied from Supplier A and B must be at least 25

PARAMETERS.name: sum_B_C
PARAMETERS.description: Sum of tables supplied from Supplier B and C must be at least 30

PARAMETERS.name: min_orders_total
PARAMETERS.description: At least 7 orders must be placed from Supplier A, B, or C

PARAMETERS.name: max_tables_A
PARAMETERS.description: Maximum number of tables that can be supplied from Supplier A

OBJECTIVE.query: Minimize total cost of the order
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \min \sum_{O \in O} (C_A \cdot x_A + C_B \cdot x_B + C_C \cdot x_C)

CONSTRAINTS.name: Order_Count
CONSTRAINTS.query: The restaurant needs to order at least 150 tables.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \sum_{O \in O} (T_A \cdot x_A + T_B \cdot x_B + T_C \cdot x_C) \geq Min_{tables}

CONSTRAINTS.name: Order_Max
CONSTRAINTS.query: The restaurant needs to order no more than 600 tables.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \sum_{O \in O} (T_A \cdot x_A + T_B \cdot x_B + T_C \cdot x_C) \leq Max_{tables}
